creator: djboulia@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 22613
Additional options for SlideShowRecordDumper

Attached patch includes my modifications to SlideShowRecordDumper to add a "verbose" mode that dumps the raw byte data for various records, and an "escher" option that dumps Escher record data. Very useful for finding issues/comparing PowerPoint documents generated by POI. These are generally useful for debug, so submitting as a patch for consideration.

Thanks for the patch. Applied in r697520.

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
